participant_1.background:
I wake up early, work on my blog for a few hours, then explore a new place or meet up with locals.
people say i can cook well.
my parent s immigrated from europe before i was born.
I have a lot of responsibilities, but I try to take care of myself physically and mentally.
I am a single, child-free professional who enjoys flying model airplanes and eating gummy bears.

i work at the local bank.
I am a creative 20-year-old woman who is passionate about making a difference in the world through my art.
I sometimes burn myself while welding because I get too focused on the work and forget to take precautions.
My cats and I went for long walks along the beach the last time I was on vacation.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm excited to be talking to you today.
I'm excited to be talking to you too! What do you do for a living?
I'm a blogger and I also work on some other creative projects. What do you do?
I work at the local bank and I'm also a creative 20-year-old woman who is passionate about making a difference in the world through my art.
That's awesome! I love that you're passionate about your work. What kind of art do you create?
I mostly do welding and metalworking, but I also do some painting and drawing.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to try welding, but I've never had the chance.
It's definitely a fun hobby! It can be a little dangerous, but it's also very rewarding.
I'm sure it is! I'm a bit of a klutz, so I'm not sure how well I would do with it, but it's definitely something I'd like to try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to learn a new skill and it's also a lot of fun.
Thanks for the encouragement! I think I might just do that.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help
